WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi,

As the issue mentioned here is already described in another work item, we are closing this one in order to unify the votes and comments in the following work item:
 - Bug in RegisterPrismLibrary.proj (Prism v4.1) (http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/workitem/9225)

Thanks for your feedback,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
WorkItem.Description:
It seems that the RegisterPrismLibrary.proj is not correct.
As 4.1 is supposed to be used for Silverlight 5. 
The contents should be changed from
 
    <RegistrationLine Include="[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft SDKs\Silverlight\v4.0\AssemblyFoldersEx\$(RegistrationKey)]"/>
 
to
 
    <RegistrationLine Include="[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft SDKs\Silverlight\v5.0\AssemblyFoldersEx\$(RegistrationKey)]"/>
 
 
And when I did that on my computer (by doing a hard edit in the registry), things started to work properly again...
 
Just for anyone out there who needed to know.
 
Mark,
WorkItem.Summary: RegisterPrismBinaries doesn't work properly for version 4.1
